=== Ubucon Asia 2021 organizers ===

Since we now have enough number of organizers. Soon, we would like to gather volunteers rather then core organizers.
But if you really want to join whether as organizer or as volunteer, You may contact Coordination team to discuss further.

Coordination team: contact@ubucon.asia
